{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-30T05:12:47.000Z", "description": "Job Description

Position Details:

Role: Product Researcher

Location: Mason, OH

Duration: 6 Months

Responsibilities
  • Past Products Researcher experience at the Researcher/Associate Scientist level
  • Executes technical tasks and methods to meet day-to-day project needs
  • Performs a wide variety of lab methods and hands-on experimentation
  • Helps enable product test placements (either through systems entry or gathering the info for others to enter)
  • Helps develop claims and demos with the products research lead
Should you have any questions, feel free to call me at (973)-494-8185 or email your resume at nagraj.ganaparpu@collabera.com.

Job Requirements

Word, research, SAN, Apple
